experiences.title: AT&T Sr. Associate Student Intern Technical I
experiences.subtitle: Software Engineer Track
workDescription: Researched the presence and characteristics of ransomware payments on the Bitcoin blockchain
Designed and trained machine learning model to classify transactions using Python and PyTorch
Investigated connections between ransomware agents and third-party retailers on the dark web

experiences.title: IISAGE at Brown University
experiences.subtitle: Undergraduate Researcher
workDescription: Researched machine learning algorithms to identify patterns in sex differences in aging across species for Integration Initiative: Sex, Aging, Genomics, & Evolution (IISAGE) research project
Created graph convolution neural network using Python and PyTorch to determine cell age and sex
Presented research to community of 100+ peers and academics in the field

experiences.title: Brown University Computer Science Department
experiences.subtitle: Undergraduate Teaching Assistant
workDescription: Led office hours and lab sessions for Introduction to Systems, Deep Learning, and Computer Vision
Redesigned and improved labs and projects to enhance student learning outcomes
Developed content connecting technical material to its social context for deeper ethical understanding
